information: In Hortalizas del Genil are a family company with over 20 years experience in the fruit and vegetable sector. We export of vegetables from Spain: organic carrot and beet We keep the agricultural tradition of the area and in turn adapt to new trends in production and marketing to improve product quality and service. As a basis of our philosophy raw work to all staff dealing with our customers, in order to collect them ideas and suggestions for improving our working systems. Countries that sell: Currently, Hortalizas del Genil is a company that dedicates 100% of its export activity. Bringing their products to tables throughout Europe by major companies and supermarket chains in the sector. Quality controls: In Hortalizas del Genil we perform exhaustive quality controls in all our products and fields: Control sugar levels, heavy, color, hydration tests and daily and weekly analytical controls. Analysis by “food Analytica GmbH” in addition to the main accreditations of the major European agencies. Organic carrot and organic beet: In Hortalizas del Genil bet for several years by organic production due to the great importance that these products are taking on the European market. Our company was a pioneer in conducting this type of agriculture with these products in our area. Spain is the first European country to organic production, Andalucía community being more land area declared as ecological (973, 239 hectares).
